desc: Since I've been pursuing the dream of building my own small crystal and gemstone shop and offering a platform to people who share the same passion as me, I am pleased to welcome you here at Ascendra!

layout.text: Welcome to the ethereal world of Ascendra!
✧˚ · . I'm so happy that you're here. Take your time and have a look at all the pretty crystals, coming directly from our mother earth ·˚ .✧
